title: 82x8: Employees on Agency Assignment to a Public International Organization and 18 U.S.C. § 207 Exceptions
summary: OGE advised that if an employee accepted a transfer to World Bank, that the employee could act on behalf of the Bank on any matter pursuant to the exceptions to 18 U.S.C. § 207 as the exception runs to employees of a public international organization on assignment from an agency.
